sentences.sContent: I listened to the programme and found they'd cut out all the interesting stuff.
sentences.sCn: 我听了那个节目，发现他们已经删掉了所有有趣的内容。

trans.tranOther: If you cut out a part of a text, you do not print, publish, or broadcast that part, because to include it would make the text too long or unacceptable
